content: सूदः [सूद्-अच्] {@--1@} Destroying, destruction, massacre. {@--2@} Pouring out, distilling. {@--3@} A well, spring. {@--4@} A cook. {@--5@} Sance, soup. {@--6@} Anything seasoned, a prepared dish. {@--7@} Split pease. {@--8@} Mud, mire. {@--9@} Sin, fault. {@--10@} The office of a charioteer. {@--11@} The Lodhra tree.
